headline.0: Is Big Media Slowly Killing Our Children?

short_description.0: Children have no chance against this tsunami of unhealthy messages that drowns them in a torrent of poor eating and obesity. While your children are immersed in media, playing video games or surfing the web, they are being sedentary instead of physically active.

authors.0:
Dr. Jim Taylor, Contributor
Sport psychologist, parenting expert, professor, author, speak...
